search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Trengo (trengo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Trengo is: [https://trengo.com/pricing](https://trengo.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Choose the pricing plan that'll help you reach goals | Trengo

extracted_content.content:

\*AI Journeys is currently in a Beta phase. Final pricing and packaging may look different once the feature is publicly available.\*

Conversations

Pay per conversation
--------------------

A conversation in Trengo is an outbound message that starts in Trengo, either as the first touch point with a customer or as a reply to a customer’s inbound conversation.

![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e230e617f32e7b280cf714_comment-alt.svg)

Standard conversation  
Use the conversations included in your plan first, then purchase additional bundles of 100 conversations whenever you need.

[Learn more](https://help.trengo.com/en/articles/417274-conversations-in-trengo)

![Image 89](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e230e60639849391bcecae_phone-volume.svg)

WhatsApp, Voice & SMS  
‍Every month, the first 1,000 WhatsApp service conversations are free. Other types of conversations will be charged according to [WhatsApp's pricing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/#conversation-categories). [Voice](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/voice/pricing/us) and [SMS](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/sms/pricing/us) usage will be charged based on their respective rates.

[View SMS rates](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/sms/pricing/us)

Conversations

Pay per additional conversation
-------------------------------

A conversation in Trengo is an outbound message that starts in Trengo, either as the first touch point with a customer or as a reply to a customer’s inbound conversation.

![Image 108](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e5e9648b35627e306ce019_cell-icons-1.svg)

![Image 109](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e5e9648b35627e306ce019_cell-icons-1.svg)

![Image 110](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e5e9648b35627e306ce019_cell-icons-1.svg)

Forward conversations

![Image 111](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e5e9648b35627e306ce019_cell-icons-1.svg)

![Image 112](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e5e9648b35627e306ce019_cell-icons-1.svg)

![Image 113](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e5e9648b35627e306ce019_cell-icons-1.svg)

[View all functionalities](https://trengo.com/pricing#)

Extend customer contact with add-ons
------------------------------------

Want to get more out of Trengo? These add-ons will extend your customer relationships for an additional cost.

Voice

![Image 114](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe7c7b4e0fd9e23b8f5_Voice.svg)

Voice Channel  
Make outbound calls and pick up inbound calls with a Voice channel.

Broadcast

![Image 115](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe6c7b4e0fd9e23b8c6_Broadcast.svg)

Broadcast  
‍‍Easily reach large groups with a targeted message.

Trengo AI

![Image 116](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe68408ae9f21771c6d_Flowbot.svg)

AI Journeys  
Create unique, AI-powered customer journeys in less than 2 minutes.

API

![Image 117](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe737af9935c542d653_API.svg)

API high rate limit  
‍Setup API access and seamlessly integrate Trengo with your tools.

Data

![Image 118](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe6d88b2b2db8eddae0_Data%20storage.svg)

Extra data storage  
‍Add additional data storage to your account. The default for Boost is two years.

Observer

![Image 119](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d20553de000754491a739_Observer%20role.svg)

Observer role  
‍Collaborate internally on conversations and maintain oversight into team activity.

![Image 120](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/679b66ad5cd6a366c71b0774_Frame%201000005670.avif)

Explore Trengo's flexible pricing plans - Boost, and Pro - designed to enhance your customer communication. Enjoy an omnichannel inbox, AI agents, and integrations to drive customer support and service. Start your 7-day free trial today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: AI Journeys feature is currently in Beta phase, and its pricing may change upon public release.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Make teamwork more efficient and optimise your customer experience.
Customise your platform and automate your conversations.
Tailor your platform to your current and future business needs.

additional_fees.fee_description: Unlimited additional users at €25 per user.

Conversations

Pay per conversation
--------------------

A conversation in Trengo is an outbound message that starts in Trengo, either as the first touch point with a customer or as a reply to a customer’s inbound conversation.

![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e230e617f32e7b280cf714_comment-alt.svg)

Standard conversation  
Use the conversations included in your plan first, then purchase additional bundles of 100 conversations whenever you need.

[Learn more](https://help.trengo.com/en/articles/417274-conversations-in-trengo)

![Image 89](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/65e230e60639849391bcecae_phone-volume.svg)

WhatsApp, Voice & SMS  
‍Every month, the first 1,000 WhatsApp service conversations are free. Other types of conversations will be charged according to [WhatsApp's pricing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/#conversation-categories). [Voice](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/voice/pricing/us) and [SMS](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/sms/pricing/us) usage will be charged based on their respective rates.

[View SMS rates](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/sms/pricing/us)

Conversations

Pay per additional conversation
-------------------------------

A conversation in Trengo is an outbound message that starts in Trengo, either as the first touch point with a customer or as a reply to a customer’s inbound conversation.

[View all functionalities](https://trengo.com/prices#)

Extend customer contact with add-ons
------------------------------------

Want to get more out of Trengo? These add-ons will extend your customer relationships for an additional cost.

Voice

![Image 114](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe7c7b4e0fd9e23b8f5_Voice.svg)

Voice Channel  
Make outbound calls and pick up inbound calls with a Voice channel.

Broadcast

![Image 115](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe6c7b4e0fd9e23b8c6_Broadcast.svg)

Broadcast  
‍‍Easily reach large groups with a targeted message.

Trengo AI

![Image 116](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe68408ae9f21771c6d_Flowbot.svg)

AI Journeys  
Create unique, AI-powered customer journeys in less than 2 minutes.

API

![Image 117](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe737af9935c542d653_API.svg)

API high rate limit  
‍Setup API access and seamlessly integrate Trengo with your tools.

Data

![Image 118](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d1fe6d88b2b2db8eddae0_Data%20storage.svg)

Extra data storage  
‍Add additional data storage to your account. The default for Boost is two years.

Observer

![Image 119](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/660d20553de000754491a739_Observer%20role.svg)

Observer role  
‍Collaborate internally on conversations and maintain oversight into team activity.

![Image 120](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b287adb93277a8f53ea884/679b66ad5cd6a366c71b0774_Frame%201000005670.avif)

Explore Trengo's flexible pricing plans - Boost, and Pro - designed to enhance your customer communication. Enjoy an omnichannel inbox, AI agents, and integrations to drive customer support and service. Start your 7-day free trial today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription plans with additional usage-based costs for conversations and AI features.

Customise your platform and automate your conversations
Tailor your platform to your current and future business needs

additional_fees.fee_description: Cost per additional user for Boost plan
